nodes.text: The Otoh Gungan Challenge was a sports racing event that was held in the Gungan city of Otoh Gunga on the planet Naboo. It was open to anyone with a single engine sub and was able to achieve a speed of at least 100 longos that was fast enough to outrun any klaa fish. Amongst the rules included no weapons being allowed which meant that military subs were prohibited unless they were decommissioned. These were the only restrictions for anyone entering into the competition otherwise the rules were wide open for contestants.
After the Battle of Naboo, the Challenge was held which saw tourists arrive and witness the bongo racing at the Otoh Gunga Garden bubble.
At one race, two aggressive racers crashed, forcing them to eject and leading to the disappearance of Squidfella Quiglee. Brooboo Seep won that time.
The following race, the two aggressive racers crashed again, to the delight of their fans.
The Otoh Gunga Challenge appears in the short story Deep Spoilers, printed in Star Wars Gamer 4 magazine.
